name: browserforce
description: Bridge AI agents to your real Chrome browser via CDP relay

scripts.relay: lsof -ti tcp:19222 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; sleep 0.3; node relay/src/index.js
scripts.relay:dev: lsof -ti tcp:19222 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; sleep 0.3; node --watch relay/src/index.js
